QuestData.Title: Great Vessel of Salvation
QuestData.Description: I know what you and the girl-panda seek. We can perform the rite for you... in time.$b$bFirst, I require aid. The seeds fall from our great mother-tree. It is our responsibility to collect them, even in dangerous times like these.$b$bEscort my chanters to the motherseeds, that they may bring them back to the collection pit.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 3 Motherseeds to the collection pit in Rikkitun Village, with the assistance of the Rikkitun Chanters.$b$bYou can use the Rikkitun Bell to re-summon your chanters if you become separated.
QuestData.CompletionText: The collection pit is down the hill, just to the west of here.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, good. The motherseeds are taken care of.$b$bNow, we may speak of your enchantment.

Objectives.Objective: Bring Motherseed back to the Motherseed Pit
